dialog.help.title: 🧭 Discover Kanban!
dialog.help.section1Text:
You can easily create a new task card in your 'To Do' list with the "New Task" button.. ✍️

You can move your tasks according to their progress status using the drag & drop method, and set deadlines. 🔄
dialog.help.section2Text:
With the "My Tasks for Today" feature, you can easily track your daily tasks! 🗓️

  • You can add tasks with different priority levels (high 🔴, medium 🟠, low 🟢)
  • You can mark tasks as completed or delete them

Plan your daily tasks to make your day more efficient and make sure you don't miss any tasks! ✅
dialog.help.section3Text:
You can see today with the calendar in the top left, and create a task specific to that day by clicking on any day you want! 🗓️

Red dots show your tasks that are due on that day. You can see which tasks are due by hovering your mouse over the date you're curious about. 👀
dialog.help.section4Text:
Earn points as you complete your tasks and give yourself small rewards with these points! 🏆

You can see your accumulated points in the top right, and add motivation rewards for yourself with the "New Reward" button. 💰

When you've collected enough points, the "Use" button becomes active - it's time to treat yourself! 💫
dialog.help.section5Text:
Create a personalized workspace! Change the colors of your task and reward cards, decorate your Kanban board with your favorite colors. 🌈

Save your favorite color combinations to always work in an environment that inspires you! ✨
dialog.help.section6Text:

privacy.title: Privacy & Data Security
privacy.dataPrivacy: Your data is private! The Kanban application does not save any of your personal data to our servers or share it with third parties.
privacy.localStorage: Local storage advantage! Your tasks, rewards, and all your settings are stored only in your browser's local storage area and do not leave your device.
